Title: 40917 - # Applications That Are Unique to the iPhone
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4 to 8 applications that are found only on Apple's iOS. The iPhone has high-powered apps like Garageband that are only found in its own ecosystem of apps. One advantage that Apple has over Android is its ability to sync all devices and make apps accessible on the iPad, iPhone and Mac. Play this fact up as much as possible. Appeal to the 20-to-30-year-old age groups as they are the ones most likely to use Apple products. The anchor text goes to the older iPhone 5c. Anchor the URL in a sentence about how older iPhones are capable of running these apps.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: using Garageband on T-Mobile's iPhone 5c

Title: 40918 - # Ways the Smartwatch Improves on the Smartphone
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4-8 ways the smartwatch enhances the smartphone experience. The smartwatch is considered an extension of the smartphone, allowing users to see who's calling, texting, and emailing at a glance. It eliminates the need to constantly reach for the phone, something that can be inconvenient, especially when in a meeting or driving to an appointment. Appeal to business professionals as they live by their smartphones and can appreciate the advantages afforded by the smartwatch. The URL links to the Samsung Gear 2. Anchor the URL in a sentence that mentions the multiple functions the watch has that go beyond notifications.
Anchor Text: samsung gear s2 branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: glancing at T-Mobile's Samsung Gear S2

Title: 40922 - # Ways the Latest Android Phones Beat Out the iPhone in 2016
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4 to 8 different ways Android phones are surpassing Apple's iPhone. Android phones have become stronger and more nimble than the iPhone what with the amount of R&D being put into the upper end. The potential audience are those in their 20s and 30s who have had iPhones a majority of the time, but are feeling let down by the phone's lack of updated hardware and are looking into possibly switching to Android. The target URL goes to the Samsung Galaxy S-6 Edge. Anchor to text discussing the advantages the S-6 Edge has over the iPhone. Resource links discuss these differences for more ideas.
Anchor Text: galaxy s6 edge branded term (brand/client name)

Title: 40926 - # Tips for Maintaining Your Blogs When You're Out of Town
Direction: 675 words. Write about 4 to 8 ways to maintain a blog remotely, or out of town. A good cell phone with a large screen and high-quality camera makes it easy for a blogger to update their blogs on the go. There are also plenty of apps for bloggers on the go. The potential audience are those in their 20s, 30s, and 40s who like to stay connected.
